apis.name: Sorting API
apis.description: Sort an array of numbers in ascending order

parameters.name: numbers
parameters.description: An array of numbers to be sorted

apis.name: Searching API
apis.description: Search for a specific element in an array

apis.name: String Length API
apis.description: Get the length of a string

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The string to get the length of

apis.name: Palindrome Checker API
apis.description: Check if a word is a palindrome

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to check for palindrome

apis.name: Random Number Generator API
apis.description: Generate a random number within a given range

parameters.name: min
parameters.description: The minimum value of the range

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: The maximum value of the range

apis.name: FizzBuzz API
apis.description: Generate FizzBuzz sequence up to a given number

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The number up to which to generate the sequence

apis.name: Email Validator API
apis.description: Validate if an email address is correctly formatted

apis.name: File Size API
apis.description: Get the size of a file in bytes
